briefTitle: Study to Investigate the Long-term Efficacy and Safety of Human-cl rhFVIII in Previously Treated Patients (PTPs)
officialTitle: Clinical Study to Investigate the Long-Term Efficacy, Safety and Immunogenicity of Human-cl rhFVIII in Previously Treated Patients With Severe Haemophilia A - Extension Study to GENA-01
summary: The purpose of the study is to study the long-term efficacy, safety and tolerability of Human-cl rhFVIII in previously treated patients with severe hemophilia A.
